code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BackgroundParticles=()=>{useEffect(()=>{const createParticle=()=>{const particle=document.createElement('div');particle.className='absolute rounded-full bg-pink-200/30';const size=Math.random()*10+5;particle.style.width=`${size}px`;particle.style.height=`${size}px`;particle.style.left=`${Math.random()*100}vw`;particle.style.top=`${Math.random()*100}vh`;particle.style.opacity=Math.random()*0.5+0.1;const animationDuration=Math.random()*20+10;particle.style.animation=`float ${animationDuration}s linear infinite`;document.getElementById('particles-container').appendChild(particle);};for(let i=0;i<30;i++){createParticle();}},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"particles-container",className:"fixed inset-0 overflow-hidden pointer-events-none"});};export default BackgroundParticles;
